page.title: 01GENERAL SUMMARY OF THE AREA.
page.content: . The block grid reference 04720363 lies in the area known as the{East {Midlands,}approximately twenty miles away from the city of{Nottingham}in a North-Easterly direction. The general overall view is of a country area of farmland and woodland. It consists mainly of part of three {agricultural estates.}The village of {Ossington}is included, where the main body of the people live. The rest of the population is sparsely spread among the surrounding farms. Although unemployment is a major problem nationally, most of the local population who wish to work, are able to do so.
